meanings.definition: Make (previously unknown or secret information) known to others.
meanings.sent1: She will reveal the surprise party to her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The magician will reveal the card chosen by the audience.
meanings.sent3: The detective will reveal the culprit in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise will reveal the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map will reveal the location of the hidden chest.

meanings.sent1: The clouds will reveal the sun after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The artist will reveal the painting at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The fog will reveal the city skyline in a mysterious way.
meanings.sent4: The mirror will reveal the reflection of the room.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight will reveal the path in the dark forest.
